data.name: simple-dftd3
data.description: Library first implementation of the D3 dispersion correction

license.name: GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0

evidence: "This package provides a library first implementation of the DFT-D3 dispersion correction" (library-first indicates it is intended to be used as a component by other programs).

"Usable via the command line interface of the `s-dftd3` executable, in Fortran via the `dftd3` module, with the C interface ... or in Python by using the `dftd3` module" (multiple language APIs for integration into other codes).
